import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;
class Acmicpc_binery 
{
    public static void main(String[] args)throws IOException
    {
        BufferedReader d=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        long T=Long.parseLong(d.readLine());
        String s1,s2;
        BigInteger x,y,result;
        while(T-->0)
        {
            s1=d.readLine();
            x=new BigInteger(s1,2);
            s2=d.readLine();
            y=new BigInteger(s2);
            y=new BigInteger(y.toString(2),2);
            result=x.add(y);
            System.out.println(result.toString(2));
        }
    }
    
}
